title: Jenwi
author: Jenwi
created_time: December 10, 2023, 10:41:14 PMLast edit: December 10, 2023, 10:57:44 PM by Jenwi
content: My wonderful country where men of substance are above the law. You cannot have a lawsuit with any politian and you win. The incorruptible judge is now corrupt. If you sue any politician in this country even when it is obvious that they are guilty and wanting, they court will find no charge against them and if you are not careful you the common man will be indicted. I shed tears to know and live in a country where the rich can take what belongs to you and you remain defenceless. Where is the principle of equality as it is shown and demonstrated on the law symbol weighing equal and on the same level so also on lady justice which is blind and having a equal scale in her hands.

comments.author: Cryptomultiplier
comments.body: Incase you doubt if the Nigerian government still upholds the rule of law, steal something as cheap as 50 Naira and be caught. Pray not to get lynched before the law enforcement agencies, particularly the police save you. The law is easily bent for those with more money or who have the money on the spot to bail themselves out from the calamity they find themselves in. The rule of law is still very much intact, but one has to know their rights and try as much as possible to keep proper evidence or proof of the right thing, so as not to fall victim of the ills that befall breaking the rules already set in place.

Na the misuse of law dey affect the country now cause why will the constitution state that no bribery but na the country still dey suffer from bribery and corruption.The simple truth be say law go hold me and you if we are find guilty but it will never hold some group of people cause the system is already corrupt, if you think say Nigeria no get law please change your thought and it's best to obey the law than proven stubbornness
